languages.text: Оружие сложено аккуратными штабелями, резко выделяясь на фоне беспорядочного нагромождения контейнеров за стенами аванпоста.
The weapons are arranged in a strict order, in vivid contrast to the haphazardly aligned walls of containers just beyond the outpost.
languages.original_text: Оружие сложено аккуратными штабелями, резко выделяясь на фоне беспорядочного нагромождения контейнеров за стенами аванпоста.

traits.locale_text: The weapons are arranged in a strict order, in vivid contrast to the haphazardly aligned walls of containers just beyond the outpost.
The weapons are arranged in a strict order, in vivid contrast to the haphazardly aligned walls of containers just beyond the outpost.

languages.text: Las armas están organizadas en un orden estricto, al contrario que las filas irregulares de contenedores a las puertas del puesto.
languages.original_text: The weapons are arranged in a strict order, in vivid contrast to the haphazardly aligned walls of containers just beyond the outpost.

traits.locale_text: Las armas están organizadas en un orden estricto, al contrario que las filas irregulares de contenedores a las puertas del puesto.

languages.text: 所有武器都按照顺序整齐排列，与哨站外面乱堆乱放的集装箱形成了鲜明的对比。
languages.original_text: The weapons are arranged in a strict order, in vivid contrast to the haphazardly aligned walls of containers just beyond the outpost.

traits.locale_text: 所有武器都按照顺序整齐排列，与哨站外面乱堆乱放的集装箱形成了鲜明的对比。

languages.text: 前哨基地のすぐ向こうのでたらめに並んだコンテナの壁との鮮やかな対照をなして、武器が整理整頓されて並んでいる。
languages.original_text: The weapons are arranged in a strict order, in vivid contrast to the haphazardly aligned walls of containers just beyond the outpost.

traits.locale_text: 前哨基地のすぐ向こうのでたらめに並んだコンテナの壁との鮮やかな対照をなして、武器が整理整頓されて並んでいる。

languages.text: Die Waffen wurden akribisch drapiert und bilden einen starken Kontrast zu den scheinbar planlos angeordneten Containerreihen hinter dem Außenposten.
languages.original_text: The weapons are arranged in a strict order, in vivid contrast to the haphazardly aligned walls of containers just beyond the outpost.

traits.locale_text: Die Waffen wurden akribisch drapiert und bilden einen starken Kontrast zu den scheinbar planlos angeordneten Containerreihen hinter dem Außenposten.

languages.text: Les armes sont rangées dans un ordre précis, en net contraste avec les murs de conteneurs disposés pêle-mêle à proximité immédiate de l'avant-poste.
languages.original_text: The weapons are arranged in a strict order, in vivid contrast to the haphazardly aligned walls of containers just beyond the outpost.

traits.locale_text: Les armes sont rangées dans un ordre précis, en net contraste avec les murs de conteneurs disposés pêle-mêle à proximité immédiate de l'avant-poste.

languages.text: Silahlar, karakolun hemen ötesinde gelişigüzel dizilmiş konteynerlerin tam aksine oldukça düzenli bir şekilde sıralanmış.
languages.original_text: The weapons are arranged in a strict order, in vivid contrast to the haphazardly aligned walls of containers just beyond the outpost.

traits.locale_text: Silahlar, karakolun hemen ötesinde gelişigüzel dizilmiş konteynerlerin tam aksine oldukça düzenli bir şekilde sıralanmış.
